Keywords: Avengers , Celebrity , Soldier
Real Name: Sam Wilson
Special Powers
CARRYING ON THE LEGACY OF CAPTAIN AMERICA IN MY OWN WAY: Captain America may start the game with the Disney+ #s002 Captain America's Shield and/or Disney+ #s007 Redwing equipped. He may have both of these equipped at the same time.
WILLING TO STAND UP AND KEEP FIGHTING: Defend, Willpower. // When an adjacent friendly character replaces their defense value with Captain America's, that character can use Toughness for that attack.
YOU JUST EARNED THIS WHOOPIN': Force Blast, Hypersonic Speed, Stealth. When Captain America uses Hypersonic Speed and hits with a close attack, after resolutions he may place a hit character adjacent to himself, then use Force Blast as FREE.

After the Hypersonic. If they wanted it to activate after the attack, they would have said after the attack resolves instead of after resolutions. So he moves, attacks, hits, moves some more, then places the hit character adjacent and knocks them back
January 23, 2023
rkb9190
[Speed] You Just Earned This Whoopin': Force Blast, Hypersonic Speed, Stealth. When Captain America uses Hypersonic Speed and hits with a close attack, after resolutions he may place a hit character adjacent to himself, then use Force Blast as FREE. Do you use the Force Blast as FREE after you resolve the attack roll or the HSS as a whole? The way its worded, it could go both ways.

hoojeebo
Yep, CCE is "passive" now, so it works with any close combat attack.
June 17, 2022
Oathful
I believe so, since you make either a close or ranged attack during Hypersonic Speed, and CCE activates during any close attack or CLOSE destroy action. There aren't many options where CCE or RCE just don't work anymore, the only ones I can think of being Quake and B/C/F since they replace damage (you would still get the attack bonus though).
June 17, 2022
BubbleBuster101
Is CCE compatible with Hypersonic Speed?
June 13, 2022
Oathful
This guy feels very overloaded. Great combat stats and powers, Redwing shenanigans, Defend that gives Toughness, and his damage output and evasiveness, I could keep going on but the fact that this guy is only 125pts for all of this is really scary. I have no clue why they threw Stealth on him either, this guy is just way to strong for the cost. The only thing I can say is that he is going to be one of the more expensive chase pieces in this set for a long time. He will be joining my Shield teams thanks to Prime Captain Carter every chance I get in a tournament that I want to win. Thematic: 7/10 Viability: 10/10 Fun Factor: 3/10, grossly leans towards competitive
May 15, 2022
Goop
So i think he was designed pretty well, hypersonic close guys really need either improved movement or a knockback effect under the new rules. They did sam correctly here, great stats, lots of powers, very strong for his cost.
